## Carry Recipe
_Reinforced Torso / Torso Wrap Cross Carry – Base Size – Torso Pass + 2 Reinforcing Passes_
- Torso Pass over baby on back
- Half Knot over chest
- Under arm and baby’s leg for Reinforced Pass
- Repeat with other tail
- TIF
